publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6174.3 Jim Mather: The Economy—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6174) in the name of Andy Kerr, leave out from first "and" to end and insert "; notes that growth is returning to the Scottish economy but that the recovery is still fragile and significant challenges remain as Scotland seeks to consolidate recovery, and calls for the Scottish Government to work with all sectors in Scotland to further build on recovery from Labour’s recession." Supported by: Keith Brown* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
